column4: i had to go away for a second.. did anyone have a suggestion on my issue?

FTP and Samba both are giving me only about 5.5-7.5MB/s.  This computer (asus p5ld2-vm motherboard) is on a gigabit network w/gigabit onboard lan, 2.2ghz core 2 duo, 2GB, raid1 w/2x750gig hd's using XFS file system.  Anyone have an idea about whats going on?
